arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multipro.name: arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multiprocessing.batch.size.msg
arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multipro.description: Number of messages in a multiprocessing batch

arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multipro.name: arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multiprocessing.batch.size.bytes
arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multipro.description: Number of bytes in a multiprocessing batch

arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multipro.name: arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multiprocessing.batch.submit.time
arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multipro.description: How long it took to submit a batch to multiprocessing

arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multipro.name: arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multiprocessing.output_batch.size.msg
arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multipro.description: Number of messages in a multiprocessing batch after the message transformation

arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multipro.name: arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multiprocessing.output_batch.size.bytes
arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multipro.description: Number of bytes in a multiprocessing batch after the message transformation

arroyo.consumer.run.count.name: arroyo.consumer.run.count
arroyo.consumer.run.count.description: Number of times the consumer is spinning

arroyo.consumer.invalid_message.count.name: arroyo.consumer.invalid_message.count
arroyo.consumer.invalid_message.count.description: Number of times the consumer encountered an invalid message.

arroyo.strategies.reduce.batch_time.name: arroyo.strategies.reduce.batch_time
arroyo.strategies.reduce.batch_time.description: How long it took the Reduce step to fill up a batch

arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multipro.name: arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multiprocessing.batch.backpressure
arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multipro.description:
Incremented when a strategy after multiprocessing applies
backpressure to multiprocessing. May be a reason why CPU cannot be
saturated.

arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multipro.name: arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multiprocessing.batch.input.overflow
arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multipro.description:
Incremented when multiprocessing cannot fill the input batch
because not enough memory was allocated. This results in batches smaller
than configured. Increase `input_block_size` to fix.

arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multipro.name: arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multiprocessing.batch.output.overflow
arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multipro.description:
Incremented when multiprocessing cannot pull results in batches
equal to the input batch size, because not enough memory was allocated.
This can be devastating for throughput. Increase `output_block_size` to
fix.

arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multipro.name: arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multiprocessing.batch.input.resize
arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multipro.description:
Arroyo has decided to re-allocate a block in order to combat input
buffer overflow. This behavior can be disabled by explicitly setting
`input_block_size` to a not-None value in `RunTaskWithMultiprocessing`.

arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multipro.name: arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multiprocessing.batch.output.resize
arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multipro.description:
Arroyo has decided to re-allocate a block in order to combat output
buffer overflow. This behavior can be disabled by explicitly setting
`output_block_size` to a not-None value in `RunTaskWithMultiprocessing`.

arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multipro.name: arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multiprocessing.batches_in_progress
arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multipro.description: How many batches are being processed in parallel by multiprocessing.

arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multipro.name: arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multiprocessing.processes
arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multipro.description:
A subprocess by multiprocessing unexpectedly died.
"sigchld.detected",
Gauge: Shows how many processes the multiprocessing strategy is
configured with.

arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multipro.name: arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multiprocessing.pool.create
arroyo.strategies.run_task_with_multipro.description: Incremented when the multiprocessing pool is created (or re-created).

arroyo.consumer.poll.time.name: arroyo.consumer.poll.time
arroyo.consumer.poll.time.description: (unitless) spent polling librdkafka for new messages.

arroyo.consumer.processing.time.name: arroyo.consumer.processing.time
arroyo.consumer.processing.time.description:
(unitless) spent in strategies (blocking in strategy.submit or
strategy.poll)

arroyo.consumer.backpressure.time.name: arroyo.consumer.backpressure.time
arroyo.consumer.backpressure.time.description: (unitless) spent pausing the consumer due to backpressure (MessageRejected)

arroyo.consumer.dlq.time.name: arroyo.consumer.dlq.time
arroyo.consumer.dlq.time.description:
(unitless) spent in handling `InvalidMessage` exceptions and sending
messages to the the DLQ.

arroyo.consumer.join.time.name: arroyo.consumer.join.time
arroyo.consumer.join.time.description:
(unitless) spent in waiting for the strategy to exit, such as during
shutdown or rebalancing.

arroyo.consumer.callback.time.name: arroyo.consumer.callback.time
arroyo.consumer.callback.time.description:
(unitless) spent in librdkafka callbacks. This metric's timings
overlap other timings, and might spike at the same time.

arroyo.consumer.shutdown.time.name: arroyo.consumer.shutdown.time
arroyo.consumer.shutdown.time.description:
(unitless) spent in shutting down the consumer. This metric's
timings overlap other timings, and might spike at the same time.

arroyo.consumer.run.callback.name: arroyo.consumer.run.callback
arroyo.consumer.run.callback.description:
A regular duration metric where each datapoint is measuring the time it
took to execute a single callback. This metric is distinct from the
arroyo.consumer.*.time metrics as it does not attempt to accumulate time
spent per second in an attempt to keep monitoring overhead low.
The metric is tagged by the name of the internal callback function being
executed, as 'callback_name'. Possible values are on_partitions_assigned
and on_partitions_revoked.

arroyo.consumer.run.close_strategy.name: arroyo.consumer.run.close_strategy
arroyo.consumer.run.close_strategy.description:
Duration metric measuring the time it took to flush in-flight messages
and shut down the strategies.

arroyo.consumer.run.create_strategy.name: arroyo.consumer.run.create_strategy
arroyo.consumer.run.create_strategy.description: Duration metric measuring the time it took to create the processing strategy.

arroyo.consumer.partitions_revoked.count.name: arroyo.consumer.partitions_revoked.count
arroyo.consumer.partitions_revoked.count.description: How many partitions have been revoked just now.

arroyo.consumer.partitions_assigned.coun.name: arroyo.consumer.partitions_assigned.count
arroyo.consumer.partitions_assigned.coun.description: How many partitions have been assigned just now.

arroyo.consumer.latency.name: arroyo.consumer.latency
arroyo.consumer.latency.description: Consumer latency in seconds. Recorded by the commit offsets strategy.

arroyo.consumer.pause.name: arroyo.consumer.pause
arroyo.consumer.pause.description:
Metric for when the underlying rdkafka consumer is being paused.
This flushes internal prefetch buffers.

arroyo.consumer.resume.name: arroyo.consumer.resume
arroyo.consumer.resume.description:
Metric for when the underlying rdkafka consumer is being resumed.
This might cause increased network usage as messages are being re-fetched.

arroyo.consumer.librdkafka.total_queue_s.name: arroyo.consumer.librdkafka.total_queue_size
arroyo.consumer.librdkafka.total_queue_s.description: Queue size of background queue that librdkafka uses to prefetch messages.

arroyo.processing.strategies.healthcheck.name: arroyo.processing.strategies.healthcheck.touch
arroyo.processing.strategies.healthcheck.description: Counter metric to measure how often the healthcheck file has been touched.

arroyo.strategies.filter.dropped_message.name: arroyo.strategies.filter.dropped_messages
arroyo.strategies.filter.dropped_message.description: Number of messages dropped in the FilterStep strategy

arroyo.consumer.dlq.dropped_messages.name: arroyo.consumer.dlq.dropped_messages
arroyo.consumer.dlq.dropped_messages.description: how many messages are dropped due to errors producing to the dlq

arroyo.consumer.dlq_buffer.len.name: arroyo.consumer.dlq_buffer.len
arroyo.consumer.dlq_buffer.len.description: Current length of the DLQ buffer deque

arroyo.consumer.dlq_buffer.exceeded.name: arroyo.consumer.dlq_buffer.exceeded
arroyo.consumer.dlq_buffer.exceeded.description: Number of times the DLQ buffer size has been exceeded, causing messages to be dropped

arroyo.consumer.dlq_buffer.assigned_part.name: arroyo.consumer.dlq_buffer.assigned_partitions
arroyo.consumer.dlq_buffer.assigned_part.description: Number of partitions being tracked in the DLQ buffer

arroyo.producer.librdkafka.p99_int_laten.name: arroyo.producer.librdkafka.p99_int_latency
arroyo.producer.librdkafka.p99_int_laten.description:
Internal producer queue latency from librdkafka statistics.
Tagged by broker_id.

arroyo.producer.librdkafka.p99_outbuf_la.name: arroyo.producer.librdkafka.p99_outbuf_latency
arroyo.producer.librdkafka.p99_outbuf_la.description:
Output buffer latency from librdkafka statistics.
Tagged by broker_id.

arroyo.producer.librdkafka.p99_rtt.name: arroyo.producer.librdkafka.p99_rtt
arroyo.producer.librdkafka.p99_rtt.description:
Round-trip time to brokers from librdkafka statistics.
Tagged by broker_id.

arroyo.producer.librdkafka.avg_int_laten.name: arroyo.producer.librdkafka.avg_int_latency
arroyo.producer.librdkafka.avg_int_laten.description:
Average internal producer queue latency from librdkafka statistics.
Tagged by broker_id.

arroyo.producer.librdkafka.avg_outbuf_la.name: arroyo.producer.librdkafka.avg_outbuf_latency
arroyo.producer.librdkafka.avg_outbuf_la.description:
Average output buffer latency from librdkafka statistics.
Tagged by broker_id.

arroyo.producer.librdkafka.avg_rtt.name: arroyo.producer.librdkafka.avg_rtt
arroyo.producer.librdkafka.avg_rtt.description:
Average round-trip time to brokers from librdkafka statistics.
Tagged by broker_id.

arroyo.producer.produce_status.name: arroyo.producer.produce_status
arroyo.producer.produce_status.description: Number of times the produce strategy failed to produce a message

arroyo.producer.librdkafka.message_count.name: arroyo.producer.librdkafka.message_count
arroyo.producer.librdkafka.message_count.description:
Producer message count metric from librdkafka statistics
Tagged by producer_name

arroyo.producer.librdkafka.message_count.name: arroyo.producer.librdkafka.message_count_max
arroyo.producer.librdkafka.message_count.description:
Maximum producer message count from librdkafka statistics
Tagged by producer_name

arroyo.producer.librdkafka.message_size.name: arroyo.producer.librdkafka.message_size
arroyo.producer.librdkafka.message_size.description:
Producer message size from librdkafka statistics
Tagged by producer_name

arroyo.producer.librdkafka.message_size_.name: arroyo.producer.librdkafka.message_size_max
arroyo.producer.librdkafka.message_size_.description:
Maximum producer message size from librdkafka statistics
Tagged by producer_name

arroyo.producer.librdkafka.txmsgs.name: arroyo.producer.librdkafka.txmsgs
arroyo.producer.librdkafka.txmsgs.description:
Total number of messages transmitted from librdkafka statistics
Tagged by producer_name

arroyo.producer.librdkafka.broker_tx.name: arroyo.producer.librdkafka.broker_tx
arroyo.producer.librdkafka.broker_tx.description:
Total number of transmission requests from librdkafka statistics
Tagged by broker_id, producer_name

arroyo.producer.librdkafka.broker_txbyte.name: arroyo.producer.librdkafka.broker_txbytes
arroyo.producer.librdkafka.broker_txbyte.description:
Total number of bytes transmitted from librdkafka statistics
Tagged by broker_id, producer_name

arroyo.producer.librdkafka.broker_outbuf.name: arroyo.producer.librdkafka.broker_outbuf_requests
arroyo.producer.librdkafka.broker_outbuf.description:
Number of requests awaiting transmission to broker from librdkafka statistics
Tagged by broker_id, producer_name

arroyo.producer.librdkafka.broker_outbuf.name: arroyo.producer.librdkafka.broker_outbuf_messages
arroyo.producer.librdkafka.broker_outbuf.description:
Number of messages awaiting transmission to broker from librdkafka statistics
Tagged by broker_id, producer_name

arroyo.producer.librdkafka.broker_connec.name: arroyo.producer.librdkafka.broker_connects
arroyo.producer.librdkafka.broker_connec.description:
Number of connection attempts to broker from librdkafka statistics
Tagged by broker_id, producer_name

arroyo.producer.librdkafka.broker_discon.name: arroyo.producer.librdkafka.broker_disconnects
arroyo.producer.librdkafka.broker_discon.description:
Number of disconnections from broker from librdkafka statistics
Tagged by broker_id, producer_name

arroyo.producer.librdkafka.broker_txerrs.name: arroyo.producer.librdkafka.broker_txerrs
arroyo.producer.librdkafka.broker_txerrs.description:
Total number of transmission errors from librdkafka statistics
Tagged by broker_id, producer_name

arroyo.producer.librdkafka.broker_txretr.name: arroyo.producer.librdkafka.broker_txretries
arroyo.producer.librdkafka.broker_txretr.description:
Total number of request retries from librdkafka statistics
Tagged by broker_id, producer_name
